items.comments: We use a single Entra tenant for all Azure resources in our organization
Azure Lighthouse is configured for partner management
Partner access is managed through Azure Lighthouse
Need to document CSP support escalation process
Cost Management views are being set up by finance team
Notification contact email is configured and monitored
Department and account structure is aligned with organization
Budgets and alerts are configured for all departments
DA and AO view charges are enabled
Dev/Test subscriptions are used for non-production workloads
Need to review and update Microsoft Customer Agreement roles
Invoice sections are set up for cost allocation
Audit process for billing RBAC needs to be documented and implemented
